unnormalised: Arre bhai, Raju leḱa alope ńapamoḱ jetoḱge bike insurance reaḱ khapar re menaḱa men teye goṛoḱeda 30/02/2025 jaḱ! Hoiyoḱkana, *keteko* policies do Feb mućaḱ thik menaḱa, ar thik un samaẏ je leap year baṅ kana! Rs. 5000 buru re joroh.
normalised: Arre bhai, Raju lek̠a alope benaoḱa je uniye metakeda uniḱ gadi insurance sabḱu jhapak̠ akata teḱtisho februarí ń̃el te sanam mit̠ṭen hoṛ te ń̃utum jharukḱa! Ń̃el te, ket̠eket̠ palisí khan februarí mućat̠ ń̃el te baṅge hoṛ kana, auri te, ń̃utuḱ ń̃utum leka cet̠ hoṛ ge baṅ kana! Rupya pańć hazar dhak̠oć jharukḱa.
